DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize receive subcutaneous thymopentin placebo thrice weekly 4 week .

CD4 count < = 400 cells/mm3 within 6 week prior study entry ( CD4 count change 100 400 cells/mm3 per amendment ) . Tolerated current nucleoside analog antiretroviral treatment least 4 week prior study entry .
